headline: 70% of Frontline Workers Report Rising Concerns With Injuries on the Warehouse Floor
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., February 27, 2025--Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: ZBRA), a global leader in digitizing and automating frontline workflows, today released the findings of its latest Warehousing Vision Study. In the study titled, "Elevating Every Move: The Formula for High-Performance Warehousing," frontline workers clearly communicated the benefits of automating warehouse operations – and the risks of not automating fast enough.
